import React from 'react'; import Button from '../button' import './itemDetails.css'; const ItemDetails = (props) => { const { pokemon,catching } = props; return (

{pokemon.name}

{pokemon.owned?

Owned : {pokemon.owned}

: null}

Type :

{ pokemon.types.map((item,idx)=>( {item.type.name} )) }

Details

Height

{(pokemon.height * 0.1).toFixed(2)} Meters

Wight

{(pokemon.weight * 0.1).toFixed(2)} Kg

Abilities

{ pokemon.abilities.map((item,idx)=>( {item.ability.name} )) }

Stats

{ pokemon.stats.map((item, idx) => (

{item.stat.name}

)) }
) } export default ItemDetails;
